meanings.sent1: I always forget where I put my keys.
meanings.sent2: Don't forget to turn off the lights before leaving the house.
meanings.sent3: I tend to forget my umbrella on sunny days.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was so bright that it made me forget all my worries.
meanings.sent5: The old man's memory was like a leaky bucket, always ready to forget.

meanings.sent1: Please don't forget to water the plants while I'm away.
meanings.sent2: It's easy to forget about the importance of self-care in our busy lives.
meanings.sent3: I always forget to check the expiration date on the milk carton.
meanings.sent4: The city lights at night make you forget the vastness of the universe.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the crashing waves made her forget all her troubles for a moment.
